content.c_venueAddress: Catherine Street, West End, London WC2B 5JF
content.name: Your Lie in April

primaryPhoto.description:
See the European premiere of YOUR LIE IN APRIL the musical in concert during it’s limited run at the West End’s Theatre Royal Drury Lane.
This adaption is based on Your Lie in April, a five-million-selling manga by Naoshi Arakawa – one of the most popular romantic stories and greatest tearjerkers in manga history.
Many of the same creative team as ‘Death Note – The Musical in Concert’ are back together, including director Nick Winston (Bonnie & Clyde) and designer Justin Williams. Music by Broadway composer Frank Wildhorn (Bonnie & Clyde, Jekyll & Hyde).
Book your YOUR LIE IN APRIL theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
